newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portuguese construction seen growing 7 pct '97.
newsitem.headline: Portuguese construction seen growing 7 pct '97.

text.p: Portugal's construction sector is expected to grow by at least seven percent in 1997, having grown by 20 percent in the first quarter compared with the same year-ago period, the building firms' association said on Tuesday.

An increase in demand for public works projects and housing following recent falls in interest rates had fuelled the demand, the Association of Civil Construction and Public Works Companies (AECOPS) said in a statement.
"After growth of about 4.8 percent in 1996, production of the civil construction sector should grow, in real terms, by more than seven percent in 1997," AECOPS said.
